faqs.question: Is there an end of program recognition?
faqs.answer: Yes! All students received an end of program signed Code Kids certificate that can be used for official purposes.

faqs.question: What is the age group of children that you cater to?
faqs.answer: We start with students as young as 7 years of age and go up to students aged 16.

faqs.question: What is the duration of your courses?
faqs.answer: Duration depends on the time of the year, usually every course has 10 lessons and classes are weekly or bi-weekly during the school term and four or five times a week during holiday camps.

faqs.question: Are your courses online or in person?
faqs.answer: We offer both online and in-person courses to accommodate different learning preferences and schedules.

faqs.question: What are enrollment requirements?
faqs.answer: Admission requirements vary by program. Generally, we look for a strong interest in coding and problem-solving skills. Some advanced courses may require prior knowledge or experience in programming.

faqs.question: When do classes start?
faqs.answer: We have multiple start dates throughout the year. Check out the schedules page on our website for the next available start date for your desired course.

faqs.question: Who are the instructors?
faqs.answer: Our instructors are experienced professionals with extensive backgrounds in their respective fields. They are passionate about teaching and committed to helping you succeed.

faqs.question: What if I need to miss a class?
faqs.answer: All of our online lectures are recorded and our instructors are available for help outside class hours as well to keep all students on track.

faqs.question: What is your location?
faqs.answer: We donâ€™t have any fixed location but we offer camps at co-working spaces such as Daftarkhwan, Kickstart and NASTP in Lahore and Islamabad. Do make sure to check the schedules page to see locations of upcoming programs.
